verbs.description: NEW YORK ( AP ) — [ARG0: U.S. stocks] [V: closed] out [ARG1: a whirlwind week] [ARGM-MNR: with a modest loss] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] [ARGM-TMP: as markets gauged how much to fret about the Trump administration 's decision to step up the trade]

NEW YORK ( AP ) — U.S. stocks closed out a whirlwind week with a modest loss Friday as [ARG0: markets] [V: gauged] [ARG1: how much to fret about the Trump administration 's decision to step up the trade]

NEW YORK ( AP ) — U.S. stocks closed out a whirlwind week with a modest loss Friday as [ARG0: markets] gauged [ARGM-MNR: how much] to [V: fret] [ARG1: about the Trump administration 's decision to step up the trade]
NEW YORK ( AP ) — U.S. stocks closed out a whirlwind week with a modest loss Friday as markets gauged how much to fret about the Trump administration 's decision to [V: step] up [ARG1: the trade]
